channel.title: Sketch - Slots on The CAD Coder
channel.description: Recent content in Sketch - Slots on The CAD Coder

item.title: Solidworks Macro - Create a Straight Slot
item.description: In this post, I tell you about how to create a Straight Slot through Solidworks VBA Macros in a sketch.

item.title: Solidworks Macro - Create a Centerpoint Straight Slot
item.description: In this post, I tell you about how to create a Centerpoint Straight Slot through Solidworks VBA Macros in a sketch.

item.title: Solidworks Macro - Create a 3-Point Arc Slot
item.description: In this post, I tell you about how to create a 3-Point Arc Slot through Solidworks VBA Macros in a sketch.

item.title: Solidworks Macro - Create a Centerpoint Arc Slot
item.description: In this post, I tell you about how to create a Centerpoint Arc Slot through Solidworks VBA Macros in a sketch.
